Job__21.33__Acceptable to the gravel of Cocytus: The Hebrew word, which St. Jerome has here rendered by the name Cocytus, (which the poets represent as a river in hell,) signifies a valley or a torrentand in this place, is taken for the low region of death and hellwhich willingly, as it were, receives the wicked at their deathwho are ushered in by innumerable others that have gone before them; and are followed by multitudes above number.
